description_for_human: Make HTTP requests from different global regions. Fetch-as-a-service for AI agents.
description_for_model: KlawFetch is an HTTP proxy API designed for AI agents. Make web requests from 4 global regions: Frankfurt (Germany), Sydney (Australia), San Francisco (USA), and New York (USA). Use for geo-restricted content, regional testing, or specific IP requirements. Agents can sign up and pay with cryptocurrency through KlawKeeper - no human interaction required. Cost: $0.001 per request. Authentication: Bearer token from KlawKeeper.
